name: CyberFunk (Nemo Scio)
description:
CyberFunk

The objective of the game is to fill the dancefloor with tiles of your colour. The enemies will put their own. Be careful, if you step in one of theirs you will receive damage, so will them if they step in your tiles.

You will lay tiles by moving or by "dancing", which will make a sound and lay tiles around you in the direction that you press.

Use the arrows to move and W, A, S, D to lay tiles. Press Esc to exit and R to restart.
